examples.example: 这台新设备的功率是一千瓦，运行起来十分高效。

translate.english: The power of this new equipment is one kilowatt and it operates very efficiently.

examples.example: 我家新安装的电器功率是一千瓦，用起来既方便又节能。

translate.english: The power of the newly installed electrical appliance in my home is one kilowatt, and it is both convenient and energy-saving to use.

examples.example: 我购买的这台机器功率是一千瓦，工作效率特别高。

translate.english: The power of this machine I purchased is one kilowatt, and its working efficiency is extremely high.
